posture: Action in the district court for Hennepin county by a mother to recover for personal injury to her minor son. The case was tried before Montgomery, J., and a jury which returned a verdict in favor of plaintiff. Defendant appealed from an order denying its motion for judgment notwithstanding the verdict or for a new trial. Affirmed.
